SubMenu.Name: Search
SubMenu.Description: Search

SubMenu.Name: Spectate Player
SubMenu.Description: Spectate this player. Click this button again to stop spectating.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport Player Me
SubMenu.Description: Teleport player to Me.

SubMenu.Name: Kill Player
SubMenu.Description: Kill this player.

SubMenu.Name: Kick Player
SubMenu.Description: Kick this player.

SubMenu.Name: Temporarily Ban Player
SubMenu.Description: Temporarily ban this player.

SubMenu.Name: Permanently Ban Player
SubMenu.Description: Permanently ban this player.

SubMenu.Name: Get Identifiers
SubMenu.Description: This will show the player's identifiers.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport Into Player Vehicle Me
SubMenu.Description: The player Teleport to my Vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport Into Player Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Teleport into the vehicle of the player.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle GPS Player
SubMenu.Description: Enables or disables the GPS route on your radar to this player.

SubMenu.Name: Heal Player
SubMenu.Description: Fill this player blood.

SubMenu.Name: Freeze To Player
SubMenu.Description: Freeze this player.

Data.Name: Banned Players
Data.Description: View and manage all banned players in this menu.

SubMenu.Name: BannedSearch
SubMenu.Description: Banned Players Search

SubMenu.Name: Unban Player
SubMenu.Description: Unban this player.

Data.Name: Player Related Options
Data.Description: Open this submenu for player related subcategories.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle NoClip
SubMenu.Description: Toggle NoClip on or off.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle NoClip Type
SubMenu.Description: Toggle the type of NoClip, there is more than type of NoClip.

SubMenu.Name: Last Teleport Back
SubMenu.Description: Go back to the last location you were at 15 seconds ago.

SubMenu.Name: Player Options
SubMenu.Description: Common player options can be accessed here.

SubMenu.Name: Godmode
SubMenu.Description: Makes you invincible.

SubMenu.Name: Invisible
SubMenu.Description: Makes you invisible to yourself and others.

SubMenu.Name: Unlimited Stamina
SubMenu.Description: Allows you to run forever without slowing down or taking damage.

SubMenu.Name: Fast Run
SubMenu.Description: Get Snail powers and run very fast!

SubMenu.Name: Fast Swim
SubMenu.Description: Get Snail powers and Swim very fast!

SubMenu.Name: Super Jump
SubMenu.Description: Get powers and do super jump.

SubMenu.Name: No Ragdoll
SubMenu.Description: Disables player ragdoll, makes you not fall off your bike anymore.

SubMenu.Name: Everyone Ignore Player
SubMenu.Description: Everyone will leave you alone.

SubMenu.Name: Stay In Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: When this is enabled, NPCs will not be able to drag you out of your vehicle if they get angry at you.

SubMenu.Name: Freeze Player
SubMenu.Description: Freezes your current location.

SubMenu.Name: Set Armor
SubMenu.Description: Set the armor for your player.

SubMenu.Name: Heal Player
SubMenu.Description: Give the player max health.

SubMenu.Name: Heal All Player
SubMenu.Description: Give the All player max health.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Night Vision
SubMenu.Description: Enable or disable night vision.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Thermal Vision
SubMenu.Description: Enable or disable Thermal vision.

SubMenu.Name: Clean Player Clothes
SubMenu.Description: Clean your player clothes.

SubMenu.Name: Dry Player Clothes
SubMenu.Description: Make your player clothes dry.

SubMenu.Name: Wet Player Clothes
SubMenu.Description: Make your player clothes Wet.

SubMenu.Name: Commit Suicide
SubMenu.Description: Kill yourself by taking the pill. Or by using a pistol if you have one.

SubMenu.Name: Player Scenarios
SubMenu.Description: Select a scenario and hit enter to start it. Selecting another scenario will override the current scenario. If you're already playing the selected scenario, selecting it again will stop the scenario.

SubMenu.Name: Weapon Options
SubMenu.Description: Add/remove weapons, modify weapons and set ammo options.

SubMenu.Name: Get All Weapons
SubMenu.Description: Get all weapons.

SubMenu.Name: Remove All Weapons
SubMenu.Description: Removes all weapons in your inventory.

SubMenu.Name: Unlimited Ammo
SubMenu.Description: Unlimited ammonition supply.

SubMenu.Name: No Reload
SubMenu.Description: Never reload.

SubMenu.Name: Set All Ammo Count
SubMenu.Description: Set the amount of ammo in all your weapons.

SubMenu.Name: Refill All Ammo
SubMenu.Description: Give all your weapons max ammo.

SubMenu.Name: Spawn Weapon By Name
SubMenu.Description: Enter a weapon mode name to spawn.

SubMenu.Name: Parachute Options
SubMenu.Description: Parachute Options.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Primary Parachute
SubMenu.Description: Equip or remove the primary parachute

SubMenu.Name: Enable Reserve Parachute
SubMenu.Description: Enables the reserve parachute. Only works if you enabled the primary parachute first. Reserve parachute can not be removed from the player once it's activated.

SubMenu.Name: Unlimited Parachutes
SubMenu.Description: Enable unlimited parachutes and reserve parachutes.

SubMenu.Name: Auto Equip Parachutes
SubMenu.Description: Automatically equip a parachute and reserve parachute when entering planes/helicopters.

SubMenu.Name: Player Appearance
SubMenu.Description: Choose a ped model, customize it and save & load your customized characters.

Data.Name: Vehicle Related Options
Data.Description: Open this submenu for vehicle related subcategories.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Options
SubMenu.Description: Here you can change common vehicle options, as well as tune & style your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Godmode
SubMenu.Description: Enable or disable specific damage types.

SubMenu.Name: Keep Vehicle Clean
SubMenu.Description: This will constantly clean your car if the vehicle dirt level goes above 0. Note that this only cleans dust or dirt. This does not clean mud, snow or other damage decals. Repair your vehicle to remove them.

SubMenu.Name: Bike Seatbelt
SubMenu.Description: Prevents you from being knocked off your bike, bicyle, ATV or similar.

SubMenu.Name: Engine Always On
SubMenu.Description: Keeps your vehicle engine on when you exit your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Disable Plane Turbulence
SubMenu.Description: Disables the turbulence for all planes. Note only works for planes. Helicopters and other flying vehicles are not supported.

SubMenu.Name: Disable Siren
SubMenu.Description: Disables your vehicle's siren. Only works if your vehicle actually has a siren.

SubMenu.Name: No Bike Helmet
SubMenu.Description: No longer auto-equip a helmet when getting on a bike or quad.

SubMenu.Name: Freeze Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Freeze your vehicle's position.

SubMenu.Name: Flash Highbeams On Honk
SubMenu.Description: Turn on your highbeams on your vehicle when honking your horn. Does not work during the day when you have your lights turned off.

SubMenu.Name: Show Vehicle Health
SubMenu.Description: Shows the vehicle health on the screen.

SubMenu.Name: Infinite Fuel
SubMenu.Description: Enables or disables infinite fuel for this vehicle, only works if FRFuel is installed.

SubMenu.Name: Repair Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Repair any visual and physical damage present on your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Auto Repair
SubMenu.Description: Automatically repairs your vehicle when it has ANY type of damage. It's recommended to keep this turned off to prevent glitchyness.

SubMenu.Name: Dirty Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Increased dirtiness of the Vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Wash Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Clean your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Engine On/Off
SubMenu.Description: Turn your engine on/off.

SubMenu.Name: Set License Plate Text
SubMenu.Description: Enter a custom license plate for your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Set License Plate Type
SubMenu.Description: Choose a custom license plate color for your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Speed Limiter
SubMenu.Description: Set your vehicles max speed to your current speed. Resetting your vehicles max speed will set the max speed of your current vehicle back to default. Only your current vehicle is affected by this option.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Vehicle Visibility
SubMenu.Description: Makes your vehicle visible/invisible. Your vehicle will be made visible again as soon as you leave the vehicle. Otherwise you would not be able to get back in.

SubMenu.Name: Flip Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Sets your current vehicle on all 4 wheels.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Vehicle Alarm
SubMenu.Description: Starts/stops your vehicle's alarm.

SubMenu.Name: Cycle Through Vehicle Seats
SubMenu.Description: Cycle through the available vehicle seats.

SubMenu.Name: Delete Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: Delete your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Fix / Destroy Tires
SubMenu.Description: Fix or destroy a specific vehicle tire, or all of them at once. Note, not all indexes are valid for all vehicles, some might not do anything on certain vehicles.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Windows
SubMenu.Description: Roll your windows up/down or remove/restore your vehicle windows here.

SubMenu.Name: Fix Vehicle Window
SubMenu.Description: Fix all vehicle windows.

SubMenu.Name: Remove Vehicle All Window
SubMenu.Description: Remove Vehicle All Window.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Doors
SubMenu.Description: Open, close, remove and restore vehicle doors here.

SubMenu.Name: Open/Close All Doors
SubMenu.Description: Open/Close all vehicle doors.

SubMenu.Name: Bomb Bay Door
SubMenu.Description: Open/close the bomb bay. Only available on some planes.

SubMenu.Name: Delete Removed Doors
SubMenu.Description: When enabled, doors that you remove using the list above will be deleted from the world. If disabled, then the doors will just fall on the ground.

SubMenu.Name: Remove Door
SubMenu.Description: Remove a specific vehicle door completely.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Doors
SubMenu.Description: Open, close, remove and restore vehicle doors here.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Neon Kits
SubMenu.Description: Make your vehicle shine with some fancy neon underglow!

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Neon Kits
SubMenu.Description: Make your vehicle shine with some fancy neon underglow!

SubMenu.Name: Change Vehicle Neon Kits
SubMenu.Description: Change Vehicle Neon Kits

SubMenu.Name: Enable Power Multiplier
SubMenu.Description: Enables the torque multiplier selected from the list below.

SubMenu.Name: Set Engine Torque Multiplier
SubMenu.Description: Set the engine torque multiplier.

SubMenu.Name: Enable Power Multiplier
SubMenu.Description: Enables the Power multiplier selected from the list below.

SubMenu.Name: Set Engine Power Multiplier
SubMenu.Description: Set the engine Power multiplier.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Extras
SubMenu.Description: Add/remove vehicle components/extras.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Liveries
SubMenu.Description: Style your vehicle with fancy liveries!

SubMenu.Name: Mod Menu
SubMenu.Description: Tune and customize your vehicle here.

SubMenu.Name: Engine (5)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Engine upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Brakes (5)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Brakes upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Transmission (4)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Transmission upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Horn (36)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Horn upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Suspension (5)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Suspension upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Armor (6)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Armor upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Window Tint (6)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Window Tint upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Wheel Category (6)
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Wheel Category upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Tire Smoke
SubMenu.Description: Choose a Tire Smoke upgrade, it will be automatically applied to your vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Vehicle Spawner
SubMenu.Description: Spawn a vehicle by name or choose one from a specific category.

SubMenu.Name: Spawn Vehicle By Model Name
SubMenu.Description: Enter the name of a vehicle to spawn.

SubMenu.Name: Spawn Inside Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: This will teleport you into the vehicle when you spawn it.

SubMenu.Name: Replace Previous Vehicle
SubMenu.Description: This will automatically delete your previously spawned vehicle when you spawn a new vehicle.

SubMenu.Name: Rockstar Editor
SubMenu.Description: Open the rockstar editor, note you might want to quit the session first before doing this to prevent some issues.

SubMenu.Name: Start Recording
SubMenu.Description: Start a new game recording using GTA V's built in recording.

SubMenu.Name: Stop Recording
SubMenu.Description: Stop and save your current recording.

Data.Name: Misc Settings
Data.Description: Miscellaneous RAM_vMenu options/settings can be configured here. You can also save your settings in this menu and change the language and theme.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport Options
SubMenu.Description: Various teleport options.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport To Coords
SubMenu.Description: Enter x, y, z coordinates and you will be teleported to that location.

SubMenu.Name: Teleport To Waypoint
SubMenu.Description: Teleport to the waypoint on your map.

SubMenu.Name: Copy Current Coords
SubMenu.Description: Copy the current coordinates.

SubMenu.Name: Development Tools
SubMenu.Description: Various development/debug tools.

SubMenu.Name: Clear Area
SubMenu.Description: Clears the area around your player (100 meters). Damage, dirt, peds, props, vehicles, etc. Everything gets cleaned up, fixed and reset to the default world state.

SubMenu.Name: Show Coordinates
SubMenu.Description: Show your current coordinates at the top of your screen.

SubMenu.Name: Timecycle Modifier
SubMenu.Description: Select a timecycle modifier.

SubMenu.Name: Normal Timecycle Modifier
SubMenu.Description: Select a Normal timecycle modifier.

SubMenu.Name: Show Speed KM/H
SubMenu.Description: Show a speedometer on your screen indicating your speed in KM/h.

SubMenu.Name: Show Speed MP/H
SubMenu.Description: Show a speedometer on your screen indicating your speed in MP/h.

SubMenu.Name: Connection Options
SubMenu.Description: Server game quit options.

SubMenu.Name: Quit Server
SubMenu.Description: Exits the game.

SubMenu.Name: Disconnect Server
SubMenu.Description: Disconnect from the server.

SubMenu.Name: Location Display
SubMenu.Description: Shows your current location and heading.

SubMenu.Name: Show Time On Screen
SubMenu.Description: Shows you the current time on screen.

SubMenu.Name: Join Notifications
SubMenu.Description: Receive notifications when someone joins the server.

SubMenu.Name: Quit Notifications
SubMenu.Description: Receive notifications when someone leaves the server.

SubMenu.Name: Show Player Blips
SubMenu.Description: Shows blips on the map for all players.

SubMenu.Name: Show Player Names
SubMenu.Description: Shows Names on overhead player.

SubMenu.Name: Hide Radar
SubMenu.Description: Hide the minimap.

SubMenu.Name: Hide Hud
SubMenu.Description: Hide all hud elements.

SubMenu.Name: Lock Camera Horizontal Rotation
SubMenu.Description: Locks your camera horizontal rotation. Could be useful in helicopters I guess.

SubMenu.Name: Lock Camera Vertical Rotation
SubMenu.Description: Locks your camera Vertical rotation. Could be useful in helicopters I guess.

SubMenu.Name: Change Language
SubMenu.Description: You can now change the language to Arabic or English using this option.

SubMenu.Name: Change Theme
SubMenu.Description: You can now change the theme to more than theme using this option.

SubMenu.Name: Default
SubMenu.Description: Default

SubMenu.Name: Theme 1
SubMenu.Description: basic

SubMenu.Name: Theme 3
SubMenu.Description: modern

SubMenu.Name: Change Location
SubMenu.Description: You can now change the locations of the menus on the screen using this option.

SubMenu.Name: Change Menu Color
SubMenu.Description: You can now change the color to different colors using this option.

SubMenu.Name: Save Settings
SubMenu.Description: Save your current settings. All saving is done on the client side, if you re-install windows you will lose your settings. Settings are shared across all servers using RAM_vMenu.

SubMenu.Name: Reset Settings
SubMenu.Description: The settings are Reset to their original and then saved.

SubMenu.Name: Server Info
SubMenu.Description: Description Server Info

SubMenu.Name: RAM_vMenu Version | v1
SubMenu.Description: Description RAM_vMenu Version

SubMenu.Name: About RAM_vMenu / Credits
SubMenu.Description: Description About RAM_vMenu / Credits

Data.Name: World Related Options
Data.Description: Open this submenu for world related subcategories.

SubMenu.Name: Time Options
SubMenu.Description: Change the time, and edit other time related options.

SubMenu.Name: Freeze/Unfreeze Time
SubMenu.Description: Enable or disable time freezing.

SubMenu.Name: Early Morning
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 06:00.

SubMenu.Name: Morning
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 09:00.

SubMenu.Name: Noon
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 12:00.

SubMenu.Name: Early Afternoon
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 15:00.

SubMenu.Name: Afternoon
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 18:00.

SubMenu.Name: Evening
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 21:00.

SubMenu.Name: Midnight
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 00:00.

SubMenu.Name: Night
SubMenu.Description: Set the time to 03:00.

SubMenu.Name: Set Custom Hour
SubMenu.Description: Choose a custom Hour.

SubMenu.Name: Set Custom Minute
SubMenu.Description: Choose a custom Minute.

SubMenu.Name: Special Weather Time
SubMenu.Description: You can set a special weather and time in your world that is not visible to all players, only you.

SubMenu.Name: Weather Options
SubMenu.Description: Change all weather related options here.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Dynamic Weather
SubMenu.Description: Enable or disable dynamic weather changes.

SubMenu.Name: Toggle Blackout
SubMenu.Description: This disables or enables all lights across the map.

SubMenu.Name: Enable Snow Effects
SubMenu.Description: This will enable snow particle effects for peds and vehicles. Combine with X-MAS Blizzard weather for best results.

SubMenu.Name: Extra Sunny
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to extra sunny!

SubMenu.Name: Clear
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to clear!

SubMenu.Name: Neutral
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Neutral!

SubMenu.Name: Smog
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Smog!

SubMenu.Name: Foggy
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Foggy!

SubMenu.Name: Cloudy
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Cloudy!

SubMenu.Name: Overcast
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Overcast!

SubMenu.Name: Clearing
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Clearing!

SubMenu.Name: Rainy
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Rainy!

SubMenu.Name: Thunder
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Thunder!

SubMenu.Name: Blizzard
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Blizzard!

SubMenu.Name: Snow
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Snow!

SubMenu.Name: Light Snow
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Light Snow!

SubMenu.Name: XMAS Snow
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to XMAS Snow!

SubMenu.Name: Halloween
SubMenu.Description: Set the weather to Halloween!
